subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Curt Schilling, who is 6-4 and nearly pitched a no-hitter against Oakland on June 7, will be placed on the 15-day disabled list Friday with what the club is calling a sore right shoulder.
snippet: Curt Schilling, who is 6-4 and nearly pitched a no-hitter against Oakland on June 7, will be placed on the 15-day disabled list Friday with what the club is calling a sore right shoulder.
